tabs.general: Global settings including unit preferences, profiles, and configuration options.
tabs.appearance: Customize the visual style of all HUD elements including fonts and colors.
tabs.hotkeys: Configure keyboard shortcuts and controller buttons for quick access to HUD toggles.
tabs.riders: Track specific riders with custom colors and icons. Highlighted on standings, map, and radar.
tabs.rumble: Configure controller vibration for racing events like bumps, wheelspin, and impacts.
tabs.updates: Automatic update checking and installation. Downloads and installs new versions from GitHub.
tabs.standings: Live race standings showing position, gaps, and rider information for all competitors.
tabs.map: Overhead view of the track with real-time rider positions. Supports zoom and display modes.
tabs.radar: Shows nearby riders relative to your position. Useful for close racing awareness.
tabs.lap_log: History of your recent lap times with sector breakdowns. Shows lap-by-lap performance.
tabs.ideal_lap: Displays your theoretical best lap time calculated from your fastest individual sectors.
tabs.telemetry: Real-time input data including throttle, brake, clutch, RPM, suspension travel, and gear.
tabs.performance: System performance metrics including frame rate and plugin execution time.
tabs.records: Lap records from online providers (CBR, MXB-Ranked) for your current track.
tabs.pitboard: Info displayed at pit area or timing points, showing position, lap times, and gap.
tabs.timing: Lap and sector timing display with comparisons to session best and personal records.
tabs.gap_bar: Visual progress bar showing your gap to the rider ahead and behind.
tabs.widgets: Simple HUD elements showing speed, position, lap count, session time, and other info.

controls.common.visible: Show or hide this element during gameplay.
controls.common.title: Toggle the title bar at the top of this HUD.
controls.common.texture: Select a background texture variant. Off uses a solid color background.
controls.common.opacity: Background transparency. 0% is fully transparent, 100% is fully opaque.
controls.common.scale: Size multiplier. Affects all text and graphics in this HUD.
controls.standings.rows: Maximum rider rows to display. More rows use more screen space.
controls.standings.col_tracked: Show icon marker for tracked riders.
controls.standings.col_status: Show session status indicator (PIT, DNS, DSQ, lap count, FIN).
controls.standings.col_penalty: Show penalty indicator when riders have active penalties.
controls.standings.col_debug: Show debug data column (developer mode only).
controls.standings.col_official_gap: Official gap column. Off hides it, Player shows your gap only, All shows all gaps.
controls.standings.col_live_gap: Live gap column. Off hides it, Player shows your gap only, All shows all gaps.
controls.standings.gap_indicator: Show gap rows between adjacent riders (races only). Off/Official/Live/Both.
controls.standings.gap_reference: Gap reference point. Leader shows gaps to P1, Player shows gaps to you.
controls.ideal_lap.sectors: Show your fastest individual sector times (S1, S2, S3).
controls.ideal_lap.laps: Show your last lap, best lap, and calculated ideal lap times.
controls.lap_log.rows: Number of recent laps to display.
controls.lap_log.order: Display order. Oldest shows oldest laps at top, Newest shows newest at top.
controls.lap_log.gap_row: Show live gap to personal best below the current lap time.
controls.lap_log.col_sectors: Show sector split times (S1, S2, S3).
controls.telemetry.display: Display mode. Graphs shows visual meters, Numbers shows text values, Both shows both.
controls.performance.display: Display mode. Graphs shows visual meters, Numbers shows text values, Both shows both.
controls.performance.cpu: Show plugin execution time in milliseconds.
controls.pitboard.show_mode: When to display. Always shows constantly, Pit shows near pit area, Splits after timing points.
controls.records.provider: Data source for leaderboard records. CBR or MXB Ranked.
controls.records.count: Number of records to display from the leaderboard.
controls.records.autofetch: Automatically fetch records when entering an event.
controls.records.col_sectors: Show sector time columns (S1, S2, S3). Only available with MXB Ranked provider.
controls.records.col_date: Show date when the record was set.
controls.timing.label: Show the label column (Split 1, Split 2, Lap).
controls.timing.time: Show the time column with split/lap times.
controls.timing.gap: Gap comparison for primary row. Off hides the gap column, or select a comparison type.
controls.timing.show: Splits shows timing only after crossing splits. Always shows timing constantly.
controls.timing.freeze: How long to display gap values after crossing a split. Off shows no gaps.
controls.timing.show_reference: Show reference times next to gaps.
controls.timing.layout: Vertical stacks elements in one column. Horizontal puts primary side-by-side, chips below.
controls.timing.secondary_pb: Show session personal best as secondary chip. Disabled when set as primary.
controls.timing.secondary_alltime: Show all-time personal best as secondary chip. Disabled when set as primary.
controls.timing.secondary_ideal: Show ideal lap (sum of best sectors) as secondary chip. Disabled when set as primary.
controls.timing.secondary_overall: Show overall best (any rider) as secondary chip. Disabled when set as primary.
controls.timing.secondary_record: Show fastest record from Records HUD as secondary chip. Disabled when set as primary.
controls.map.range: Zoom level. Full shows entire track, or select a specific range in meters.
controls.map.rotation: When On, the map rotates so your heading is always up. When Off, the map stays fixed to track.
controls.map.outline: Show the track outline. Useful for orientation but can be disabled for a cleaner look.
controls.map.track_width: Thickness of the track outline line.
controls.map.colorize: Rider marker colors. Uniform uses same color, Brand uses bike colors, Position by relative pos.
controls.map.rider_shape: Icon shape for rider markers on the map. Off hides non-tracked riders.
controls.map.marker_scale: Size of rider markers relative to the map.
controls.map.labels: Labels next to riders. Position shows P1/P2, Race Num shows numbers, Both shows both.
controls.radar.mode: Display mode. Off hides radar, On shows always, Auto-hide shows only when riders are nearby.
controls.radar.range: Detection radius in meters. Riders outside this range are not shown.
controls.radar.player_arrow: Show your own position arrow at the radar center.
controls.radar.colorize: Rider marker colors. Uniform uses same color, Brand uses bike colors, Position by relative pos.
controls.radar.rider_shape: Icon shape for rider markers on the radar.
controls.radar.marker_scale: Size of rider markers on the radar.
controls.radar.labels: Labels next to riders. Position shows P1/P2, Race Num shows numbers, Both shows both.
controls.radar.proximity_arrows: Directional arrows for nearby riders. Edge shows on screen edge, Circle shows around center.
controls.radar.alert_distance: Distance at which proximity arrows appear.
controls.radar.proximity_color: Color mode for proximity arrows. Distance fades with proximity, Position uses relative colors.
controls.radar.proximity_shape: Icon shape for proximity warning arrows.
controls.gap_bar.freeze: How long to freeze the gap bar display after a change.
controls.gap_bar.show_gap: Show gap time text in the center of the bar.
controls.gap_bar.show_gap_bar: Show the green/red gap visualization bars.
controls.gap_bar.range: Time range displayed on the gap bar in seconds.
controls.gap_bar.width: Width multiplier for the gap bar.
controls.gap_bar.marker_mode: Ghost shows your best lap marker. Opponents shows other riders. Both shows all.
controls.gap_bar.icon: Icon shape used for rider markers on the bar.
controls.gap_bar.labels: Labels shown next to markers. Position, race number, or both.
controls.general.controller: Select which controller to use for gamepad widget and rumble effects.
controls.general.speed_unit: Unit for speed display. mph or km/h.
controls.general.fuel_unit: Unit for fuel display. Liters or Gallons.
controls.general.grid_snap: When enabled, HUDs snap to a grid when dragging.
controls.general.screen_clamp: When enabled, HUDs are clamped to stay within screen bounds when dragging.
controls.general.auto_switch: Automatically switch profiles based on session type.
controls.general.copy_profile: Copy current profile settings to another profile.
controls.general.reset_profile: Reset current profile to default settings.
controls.general.reset_all: Reset all profiles and settings to defaults.
controls.updates.check_enabled: Check for updates when the game starts.
controls.updates.debug_mode: Test update installation without overwriting the real plugin.
controls.updates.channel: Stable only shows final releases. Prerelease includes test builds.
controls.updates.install: Download and install the available update. Requires game restart.
controls.updates.status: Current update status and version information.
controls.appearance.font_marker: Font used for map and radar markers.
controls.appearance.font_small: Font used for small text and footnotes.
controls.appearance.color_primary: Primary text color used for important information.
controls.appearance.color_secondary: Secondary text color for labels and less important text.
controls.appearance.color_muted: Muted color for disabled or inactive elements.
controls.appearance.color_accent: Accent color for buttons and highlights.
controls.appearance.color_positive: Color indicating positive values (faster times, improvements).
controls.appearance.color_negative: Color indicating negative values (slower times, losses).
controls.appearance.drop_shadow: Add a shadow behind all text for improved readability.
controls.rumble.enabled: Enable or disable controller vibration for all events.
controls.rumble.stack: When enabled, multiple rumble effects combine. When off, only the strongest effect plays.
controls.rumble.crashed: Continue rumble effects while the rider is crashed.
controls.rumble.bumps: Vibration from suspension travel over bumps. Min/Max set the suspension velocity range in m/s.
controls.rumble.slide: Vibration when the bike slides sideways. Min/Max set the slide angle range in degrees.
controls.rumble.spin: Vibration from rear wheel spin. Min/Max set the wheel slip ratio range.
controls.rumble.lockup: Vibration when brakes lock up. Min/Max set the wheel slip ratio range.
controls.rumble.wheelie: Vibration during wheelies. Min/Max set the pitch angle range in degrees.
controls.rumble.steer: Vibration from steering forces. Min/Max set the steering torque range in Newton-meters.
controls.rumble.rpm: Vibration synchronized with engine RPM. Min/Max set the RPM range.
controls.rumble.surface: Vibration from rough terrain. Min/Max set the vehicle speed range when off-track.
controls.widgets.lap: Shows current lap number and total laps in the session.
controls.widgets.position: Shows your current race position (P1, P2, etc.).
controls.widgets.time: Shows elapsed session time or time remaining.
controls.widgets.session: Shows current session type (Practice, Qualifying, Race).
controls.widgets.speed: Shows current speed with gear indicator that turns red at shift point.
controls.widgets.speedo: Analog speedometer gauge showing current speed.
controls.widgets.bars: Vertical bars showing throttle, brake, clutch, RPM, suspension, and fuel levels.
controls.widgets.notices: Displays game notifications like wrong way, blue flag, last lap, and finished indicators.
controls.widgets.fuel: Shows remaining fuel level and estimated laps.
controls.widgets.gamepad: Visual representation of controller button inputs.
controls.widgets.lean: Shows rider lean angle in degrees with arc gauge.
controls.widgets.pointer: Mouse pointer for interacting with HUD elements.
controls.hotkeys.map: Toggle the track map HUD on/off.
controls.hotkeys.lap_log: Toggle the lap log HUD on/off.
controls.hotkeys.ideal_lap: Toggle the ideal lap HUD on/off.
controls.hotkeys.input: Toggle the input display HUD on/off.
controls.hotkeys.gap_bar: Toggle the gap bar HUD on/off.
